responsibilities: Reduced tech debt by 80% across 3 React microservices by refactoring components into modular, WCAG-compliant patterns using ReactJS and SonarSource
Enforced consistent code quality by setting up Husky pre-commit hooks with Lint-Staged to auto-run linters and formatters on staged files, preventing bad commits
Removed Moment.js usage across multiple projects to reduce bundle size, replacing it with native Date objects and lightweight utilities for parsing and formatting
Built real-time auction UIs using ReactJS, TypeScript, Redux, TanStack Query, Material UI, and WebSockets, enabling 250K+ drivers across 30+ cities to view and match with jobs live on web and mobile
Led a 5-member team to ship Bidding, MIS, and POD dashboards using React, Formik, and React Hook Form, cutting customer response time by 24 hours and doubling driver reimbursement speed
Migrated the Partner mobile app from React Native CLI to Expo, resolving native module issues and integrating EAS Build to streamline authentication and push notification flows
Maintained high test coverage across critical frontend modules using React Testing Library and Vitest, ensuring reliable, regression-free feature rollouts
Built a reusable React hook to persist filters in URL state, saving ops teams 10+ minutes per workflow and improving developer collaboration during issue triaging and debugging

Rewrote core parts of the Document module using Spring Boot, AngularJS, ag-Grid, and Apache Lucene, adding filters and improving search; this sped up UI performance by 40% and contributed $100K+ in yearly revenue
Created a real-time banner editing tool using AngularJS, JavaScript (ES6), Java, and Canvas API, giving admin users the ability to manage content live with full CRUD support
Migrated legacy UIs from JSP and AngularJS to OJET v13 using Knockout for two-way binding and Preact for fast rendering; rewrote uploader logic to support chunked uploads and lazy loading
Built and owned REST APIs for two microservices using Java, Spring MVC, ReactJS, and Docker, working closely with testers to improve performance and reduce turnaround time
Set up a secure secrets management system using Vault, Terraform, Ansible, Docker, and Consul; removed plaintext credentials and supported FedRAMP readiness with high-availability setup
Developed a TDD-based test automation suite using Cucumber, Selenium, Java, and Jenkins

projects.title: Image Clustering, Indexing & Relevance Feedback
projects.description: Advanced image analysis system implementing DBSCAN clustering, LSH-based approximate nearest neighbor search, and interactive relevance feedback on the Caltech101 dataset. Developed a complete pipeline including dimensionality estimation, multi-model classification (k-NN, Decision Trees, PageRank), and real-time feedback integration using SVM and probabilistic models for improved retrieval accuracy.

projects.title: Image Feature Modeling & Latent Semantic Analysis
projects.description: Advanced multimedia analysis system for image retrieval using deep learning and vector-based feature models. Implemented feature extraction (ResNet50, HOG, Color Moments), similarity search, and latent semantic analysis (SVD, NNMF, LDA) on the Caltech101 dataset. Developed a flexible pipeline supporting multiple feature spaces and similarity metrics.

projects.title: Content-Based Image Retrieval System
projects.description: A sophisticated image search system that finds visually similar images using multiple feature extraction techniques (Color Moments, HOG, ResNet50). Implements efficient similarity search with a MySQL backend and provides a terminal-based interface for querying and retrieving top-k similar images.

projects.title: Secure Werewolves Game - Security Refactor
projects.description: Redesigned the communication architecture of a multiplayer UNIX-based Werewolves game to mitigate side-channel attacks, race conditions, and covert inference channels. Implemented secure message passing, non-blocking I/O, and RPC mechanisms while addressing critical vulnerabilities.

projects.title: MiningVis - Bitcoin Mining Dashboard
projects.description: An interactive dashboard that visualizes the dynamics of Bitcoin mining through data-driven insights and compelling visualizations.

projects.title: Squirrel Encounters Visualization
projects.description: Interactive visualization of squirrel encounters at NYC Central Park, showcasing data patterns and behaviors.

projects.title: Character Flow Visualizer
projects.description: An interactive D3.js-based tool that transforms text into dynamic treemap and Sankey diagrams, revealing character patterns and relationships.

projects.title: VitalTrack - Mobile Health Monitor
projects.description: A sensor-driven Android application that tracks heart rate, respiratory rate, and symptoms using the phone's camera and accelerometer. Features local data storage with RoomDB and a clean, intuitive interface for health monitoring.

projects.title: Cryptoverse - Crypto Dashboard
projects.description: A dynamic cryptocurrency dashboard providing real-time market data, price tracking for 100+ coins, and the latest crypto news. Features interactive charts, detailed coin information, and a clean, responsive interface.

projects.title: Exercise Finder App
projects.description: A modern web application that helps users discover and learn exercises based on muscle groups, equipment, or exercise names. Features real-time search, video integration, and intelligent exercise recommendations with a clean, responsive interface.

projects.title: Elastic Face Recognition Application
projects.description: Designed a scalable pipeline using FFmpeg, OpenCV, and ResNet; implemented autoscaling with AWS EC2, SQS, and S3 to handle 100+ concurrent video jobs.

projects.title: Mergedeck
projects.description: Built a full-stack B2B marketplace with Next.js, Tailwind, Supabase, and Stack Auth; developed REST APIs, enforced RLS policies, and handled server-side logic for onboarding, dynamic forms, and role-based access.

projects.title: TicTacToe AI & Multiplayer
projects.description: A feature-rich Tic-Tac-Toe game with AI opponent (Min-Max and Alpha-Beta Pruning algorithms) and multiplayer modes. Includes local 2-player, single device play, and Bluetooth-connected multiplayer across devices. Features difficulty levels and persistent game data storage using RoomDB.

projects.title: Resume Reviewer
projects.description: Collaborative resume annotation tool that allows users to upload, view, and annotate PDF resumes in real-time. Supports in-browser PDF viewing with PDF.js and enables team-based resume review with comment functionality.

projects.title: Calorie Tracker
projects.description: Full-stack nutrition tracking application with JWT authentication and role-based dashboards. Users can log meals, track daily calorie intake against customizable limits, and view progress. Includes admin features for user management, meal entry management, and detailed reporting with weekly averages and insights.
